Mad Lit is an html5 mash-up app created by L. Crilly with Sencha Touch 2.3.1 using RESTful APIs: (1) Voice RSS API and (2) Open Library Cover API.

Mad Lit is a game where words in classic literature are replaced by user generated words. The Voice RSS API is a text-to-speech API and is incorporated to read aloud the final composed text. The Open Library Cover API is incorporated to display the book cover of the classic literature.

The background image is licensed from Dreamstime.
